Believing Too

I designed and painted this mural in Chicago's Block 37 building for Re/View, the special exhibition of the 2013 Chicago Design Museum. The design is motivated by the observation that our senses are not unbiased data collectors. The senses are inventive and pliable; they fill in gaps and invent content that is not always there.
